languages.text: "Меня радует ваше смирение, {name}. Не сомневайтесь, что при разбирательстве вашего прискорбного промаха оно будет зачтено".
"Your humility is heartening, {name}. Rest assured, it will be noted during the investigation of your lamentable oversight."

languages.text: 「その謙虚さは強さになる、{name}。安心しろ、この尋問中、お前が過失に対して遺憾の意を表明していたことは記録しておく」
languages.original_text: "Your humility is heartening, {name}. Rest assured, it will be noted during the investigation of your lamentable oversight."

languages.original_text: "Your humility is heartening, . Rest assured, it will be noted during the investigation of your lamentable oversight."

languages.text: “你的谦逊使我感到宽慰，{name}。放心吧，对你那可悲的疏忽罪名进行调查时，我会记得你的坦诚态度。”
languages.original_text: "Your humility is heartening, {name}. Rest assured, it will be noted during the investigation of your lamentable oversight."

traits.locale_text: “你的谦逊使我感到宽慰，{name}。放心吧，对你那可悲的疏忽罪名进行调查时，我会记得你的坦诚态度。”

languages.text: «Su humildad es esperanzadora, {name}. Le aseguro que se tendrá en cuenta durante la investigación de su lamentable descuido».
languages.original_text: "Your humility is heartening, {name}. Rest assured, it will be noted during the investigation of your lamentable oversight."

traits.locale_text: «Su humildad es esperanzadora, {name}. Le aseguro que se tendrá en cuenta durante la investigación de su lamentable descuido».

languages.text: « Votre humilité fait chaud au cœur, {name}. Soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que nous en tiendrons compte lorsque nous mènerons l'enquête sur votre lamentable échec. »
languages.original_text: "Your humility is heartening, {name}. Rest assured, it will be noted during the investigation of your lamentable oversight."

traits.locale_text: « Votre humilité fait chaud au cœur, {name}. Soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que nous en tiendrons compte lorsque nous mènerons l'enquête sur votre lamentable échec. »

languages.text: "Eure Demut ist herzerwärmend, {name}. Seid versichert, dass sie bei der Untersuchung Eurer bedauernswerten Nachlässigkeit berücksichtigt wird."

languages.text: "Alçak gönüllülüğün iç rahatlatıcı {name}. Endişe etme, içler acısı gafletin hakkında inceleme yapılırken bu da göz önünde bulundurulacak."
